name: Ambushed (itch)
description:
Welcome to the Itch.io Site of Ambushed (ETA_Game) a fast-paced Arena-Shooter. 

Local Coop and Controller requiert to play the Game. (1v1)

Input

  • R1 Shooting
  • L1 Dash
  • Left-Stick  Movement
  • Right-Stick  Aim (Indicator)
  • B (hold) Reload

Dynamics

  • Wall Jumping 
  • Ammunition is destroyable
  • Different Levels / Set different Rules
  • Ammunition slows Movement

Feedback

  • Feedback is highly appreciated 
  • Does Level 2/3 change your Gameplay?
  • What expect you to get good in the game?
  • What Strategies emerge from your play?
  • Which Level is the most fun?
  • Does the Controlls feel responsive?
  • Current Gamespeed alright?

Informations

  • Student Project at the BTK ( Berliner Technische Kunsthochschule)
  • Around 3 Month Production Time
  • Unity 5.6
  • Focused on "Online-Connectivity through UNet
  • Focused on Progression and Skillbased Gameplay
  • Game Design Course ( Richard Boeser)
